titleStmt.title: The case of allegiance in our present circumstances consider'd in a letter from a minister in the city to a minister in the country.
titleStmt.author: Masters, Samuel, 1645 or 6-1693.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Masters. Cf. BM.
In this ed. the last line of the text reads: committed and to accept the services of.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
